animeTitle: I’m Stuck on the Same Day for a Thousand Years
otherNames: Wo Bei Kun Zai Tongyi Tian Yiqian Nian, 1000年間同じ日を繰り返した俺は無双する, Estuve Atrapado en Este Día Durante Mil Años, I'm Stuck on the Same Day for a Thousand Years, I'm Trapped in This Day for One Thousand Years, Llevo Mil Años Atascado en el Mismo Día, Llevo Mil
synopsis: Wu Chen transmigrated to a new world, Got trapped on the day of July 7, 2020, Constantly reincarnating! He used to indulge himself doing all sorts of evil things while running wild in despair, but every new day, everything would start all over again. In this way, he has been reincarnated for a thousand years, and on a new day, the sun rose as usual.
